title: Ranked issue - Can't select champion
body:
So I just had a pretty big issue, I was in game, the player in 3rd pick who was selecting @ the time had the very same issue.
After the enemy team selected their two camps, it remained with them highlighted like they had not selected a champion, it anvil/metal sound it does when it's your turn to select a champion, all the champions portraits remained dark as if it was not my turn, the counter for the enemy champ select continued to count down from where it was at when they selected their champs and it made the anvil sound, there was approx 15 seconds remaining, after which it booted me from the lobby because of "Failure to select a champion", I lost 3 LP and got slapped on a 6 minute ban from queues.
I imagine the poor fellow in 4th pick had the very same issue.

It's not a huge loss...
I imagine it would be if someone were in promo's or something...

What's the deal Rito?

PS: Anyone had the same issue?/Know how to fix it?

replies.body: I had the exact same issue so i had to ask my mate to dodge because i was in promos
Shaclone had the same issue, he put a youtube video up about it, no fix yet though.
